thread.title: Monica Bellucci never goes to the gym.
thread.title_full: Monica Bellucci never goes to the gym.

title: Monica Bellucci never goes to the gym.
text:
Monica Bellucci has insisted she never goes to the gym and likes to indulge in whatever foods she likes. 
Monica Bellucci never goes to the gym. 
The 51-year-old actress - who has become the oldest woman to ever play a Bond girl in the upcoming film 'Spectre' - has insisted she doesn't pay much attention to her good looks. 
She said: ''I'm just too lazy. I never go to the gym. And I love to eat chocolate and pasta. I'm not obsessed with being skinny.'' 
Although Monica has become famous for her natural beauty and sex appeal, she originally studied to become a lawyer as she ''wanted to pursue a serious occupation because there is a lot of pressure being considered an attractive woman in Italy.'' 
And despite ditching that career to become a model and actress, the brunette beauty has claimed she still doesn't obsess over her appearance. 
She told the Daily Mirror newspaper: ''I don't stress myself about my looks. I love to laugh. I like being able to lead an interesting life.'' 
Meanwhile, the 'Malena' star has confessed she's thrilled she was chosen to play Bond's older love interest, even if actor Daniel Craig is only four years younger than her in real life. 
She added: ''It's important to show that a woman at 50 can be just as interesting and Â­attractive as a woman who is 30.'' Contactmusic
